refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: A revision contains information about a single revision to a document. Revisions are identified by a number and a date. They may also include the initials of the author, and additional remarks.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: The revisions are often presented in a list or table. In a tabular presentation, each revision most likely forms a row in the table.
